name: Baserow
natural_language_description: 这是 Baserow 节点。主要用于: Consume the Baserow API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: row

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getAll
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Retrieve many rows

databaseId.name: databaseId
databaseId.description: Database to operate on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
databaseId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Database Name or ID | 作用: Database to operate on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

tableId.name: tableId
tableId.description: Table to operate on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
tableId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Table Name or ID | 作用: Table to operate on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

rowId.name: rowId
rowId.description: ID of the row to delete
rowId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Row ID | 作用: ID of the row to delete | (必填项)

dataToSend.name: dataToSend
dataToSend.description: Whether to insert the input data this node receives in the new row
dataToSend.natural_language_description: 参数名: Data to Send | 作用: Whether to insert the input data this node receives in the new row | 默认值: defineBelow
available_options: Auto-Map Input Data to Columns (值: autoMapInputData) - Use when node input properties match destination column names
Define Below for Each Column (值: defineBelow) - Set the value for each destination column

inputsToIgnore.name: inputsToIgnore
inputsToIgnore.description: List of input properties to avoid sending, separated by commas. Leave empty to send all properties.
inputsToIgnore.natural_language_description: 参数名: Inputs to Ignore | 作用: List of input properties to avoid sending, separated by commas. Leave empty to send all properties.

fieldsUi.name: fieldsUi
fieldsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields to Send | 默认值: {}

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

additionalOptions.name: additionalOptions
additionalOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: filters (值: None) - Filter rows based on comparison operators
filterType (值: None) - This works only if two or more filters are provided. Defaults to `AND`
search (值: None) - Text to match (can be in any column)
order (值: None) - Set the sort order of the result rows
